what_is.question: What services does ALLBS provide?
what_is.answer: ALLBS offers a comprehensive suite of AI-powered solutions including image processing, ID photo creation, file preview and management, and more.

how_accurate.question: How accurate is the AI?
how_accurate.answer: Our AI achieves over 99% accuracy in most cases, thanks to advanced deep learning algorithms trained on millions of images.

id_photo.question: How does the ID photo feature work?
id_photo.answer: Our AI automatically detects face position, adjusts photo size, and provides various background colors to meet different ID photo requirements.

file_preview.question: What file types are supported for preview?
file_preview.answer: We support most common file formats including images (JPG, PNG, WEBP), documents (PDF, DOC), and more.

supported_formats.question: What image formats are supported?
supported_formats.answer: We support all major image formats including JPG, PNG, WEBP, and TIFF. Maximum file size is 50MB.

cloud_storage.question: How secure is the cloud storage?
cloud_storage.answer: We use industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect your files. All data is stored in compliance with privacy regulations.

refund_policy.question: What's your refund policy?
refund_policy.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for all paid plans. No questions asked.

ai_features.question: What AI features are available?
ai_features.answer: Our platform offers multiple AI capabilities including image background removal, ID photo generation, image enhancement, face detection, and smart cropping. All features are continuously updated with the latest AI technologies.

batch_limits.question: What are the batch processing limits?
batch_limits.answer: Batch processing limits vary by plan. Free users can process up to 5 files simultaneously, Pro users up to 100 files, and Enterprise users have unlimited batch processing capability.

processing_time.question: How long does processing take?
processing_time.answer: Most single file operations complete within seconds. Batch processing time depends on file quantity and size, but our system optimizes processing for maximum efficiency.

output_quality.question: What about the output quality?
output_quality.answer: We maintain high output quality across all features. Images are processed at their original resolution with options to adjust quality and file size as needed.

data_privacy.question: How do you handle data privacy?
data_privacy.answer: We take data privacy seriously. All uploads are encrypted, processed in isolated environments, and automatically deleted after processing unless cloud storage is enabled. We comply with GDPR and other privacy regulations.

api_integration.question: Can I integrate these features into my own application?
api_integration.answer: Yes, we provide comprehensive API access for Pro and Enterprise users. Our API documentation includes examples in multiple programming languages and dedicated technical support.

supported_browsers.question: Which browsers are supported?
supported_browsers.answer: Our platform works on all modern browsers including Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge. We recommend keeping your browser updated for the best experience.

offline_access.question: Is offline access available?
offline_access.answer: While our platform is primarily cloud-based, Enterprise customers can request on-premises deployment for specific features. Contact our sales team for details.
